alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 3:41PM CDT until August 06 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chilton County in central Alabama... Southern Shelby County in central Alabama... Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 341 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake View to 8 miles east of Akron, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Calera, Montevallo, Brent, Columbiana, Centreville, Jemison, Wilsonville, Thorsby, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Wilton, American Village, Maylene, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Low Gap and Mertz. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
